item.title: frequently asked questions
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
Find the answers to our mostly asked questions

Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose injected humour and the like.
How to upload a post in SocialV?

By using an upload box, you can upload a post manually or embedding URL
More References : Check Video Link

How can I create a forum in a SocialV?

Two ways you can create a forum in Social V .
1 – Administrator
2 – Can add a forum by using it in a group.
More References : Check Video Link

How to Setup Forums using bbPress Integrate With BuddyPress ?

More References : Check Video Link

How to customize login form styles?

More References : Check Video Link

How do set the sidebar area, set up the menu, and add features?

First, go to appearance, then go to a widget, there you will find the sidebar area, and then click on the select navigation where you will find the choices menu. These are the same steps to follow for all three things asked in the question.
More References : Check Video Link

How to configure the register, login, and forget password pages?

More References : Check Video Link

How to resolve the problem with the page redirecting to the login page:

More References : Check Video Link

How to set dummy data in LMS (LearnPress) ?

More References : Check Video Link

Not Able To Upload any Posts Or Videos ?

Set the steps accordingly in the backend site, Steps are given in the screenshot below : https://prnt.sc/Y6vs_Sg8AKmR

How to change color attribute with verious options style in SocialV ?

More References : Check Video Link

How to Setup User Profile Points/Badges in SocialV?

More References : Check Video Link

How to Set Bottom Chat Tab in Friends/Groups ?

Set the steps accordingly in the backend site, Steps are given in the screenshot below : https://prnt.sc/vN6JpZUMi4mb

Stories are not showing ?

Try saving options as manually. Go to WP-Admin -> Stories -> Options and click Save button. Steps are given in the screenshot below : https://prnt.sc/I-BEn2N9eRl6

if notification setting empty how to solved ?

Set the steps accordingly in the backend site, Refer to this link :-
https://prnt.sc/5ir8fKbWPiNX

How to Complete Setup Guide Steps in SocialV?

More References : Check Video Link

Not able to send mail even after being a registered user?

Check whether you have set up SMTP for sending mail. If not setup SMTP with the help of this plugin – wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp
More References : Check Video Link

How to add new fields and new groups to the user profile?

First, go to appearance, then go to users, there you will find the profile fields, and then click on the add new group. These are the same steps to follow for all three things asked in the question.
More References : https://prnt.sc/0to_b789tFc0

item.title: Restricted content
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
Restricted Content

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.
“ Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam “
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

item.title: Hosting now has origin servers in Europe and Asia
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
The Real Power of Social Media

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.
“ Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam “
By Courtney HenryBut I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

Unofficial Holidays

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself
Holdiday planning month:
  • Suspendisse ullamcorper diam sit amet nunc auctor, a lacinia augue ornare.
  • Morbi sed enim lobortis, mollis nunc non, facilisis magna.
  • Praesent convallis tellus quis metus dapibus, vitae bibendum dui gravida.
  • Pellentesque bibendum risus luctus dolor consequat, et bibendum est tincidunt.
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter

item.title: Designing an Identity Manager is supereasy
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
The Real Power of Social Media

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.
“ Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam “
By Courtney HenryBut I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

Unofficial Holidays

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself
Holdiday planning month:
  • Suspendisse ullamcorper diam sit amet nunc auctor, a lacinia augue ornare.
  • Morbi sed enim lobortis, mollis nunc non, facilisis magna.
  • Praesent convallis tellus quis metus dapibus, vitae bibendum dui gravida.
  • Pellentesque bibendum risus luctus dolor consequat, et bibendum est tincidunt.
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter

The Real Power of Social Media

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.

By Courtney HenryBut I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself

item.title: Photo editing tool : how to use the different tools ?
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
The Real Power of Social Media

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.
“ Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam “
By Courtney HenryBut I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

Unofficial Holidays

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself
Holdiday planning month:
  • Suspendisse ullamcorper diam sit amet nunc auctor, a lacinia augue ornare.
  • Morbi sed enim lobortis, mollis nunc non, facilisis magna.
  • Praesent convallis tellus quis metus dapibus, vitae bibendum dui gravida.
  • Pellentesque bibendum risus luctus dolor consequat, et bibendum est tincidunt.
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter

The Real Power of Social Media

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking.These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.
“ Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam “
By Courtney HenryBut I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes it.

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself

  • Pellentesque bibendum risus luctus dolor consequat, et bibendum est tincidunt.
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
